data.title: 2017 NMA Conference – Nebraska Museums Association
data.text:
2017 NMA Conference

Back to the Basics

April 3-4, 2017, Lincoln, Nebraska

Hosted by Nebraska State Historical Society

Nebraska History Museum, 131 Centennial Mall, North, Lincoln

Thank you to everyone who participated in making the 2017 NMA Conference a success.

Many of are speakers have generously shared their presentations and other resources. Please enjoy this easy reference and great resource!

Exhibits Workshop

Helping Hands Volunteer Program

Karen Keehr (Nebraska State Historical Society): NSHS glass plate cleaning

Keynote

Trevor Jones (Nebraska State Historical Society): Active Collections: Rethinking the Role of Museum Collections

Collections Basics

Laura Steinman (Arbor Lodge State Historical Park)

Ali Abler (Buffalo Bill Ranch State Historical Park)

Community Engagement & Outreach

Sarah Feit, (University of Nebraska State Museum)

Benjamin Clark (Boys Town Hall of History and Father Flanagan House)

Lunch Speaker

Archives Basics

Mary Ellen Ducey (UNL Archives & Special Collections): Archives Management

Karen Keehr (Nebraska State Historical Society): NMA Photos

Cased photo boxes

National Park Service Conserve O Gram: How to Flatten Folded or Rolled Paper Documents

Hilary LaFevere (NSHS Ford Conservation Center): NMA Paper Preservation PPT 2017

Ford Conservation Center Resources

Educational Programming

Nancy Round (Joslyn Art Museum) and Katie Karr (Hastings Museum): Back to Basics. Or Not…

Digital Solutions for Museums

Karen Keehr (Nebraska State Historical Society): NMA Digital imaging in an Archives World

Mandy Haase-Thomas (University of Nebraska State Museum): Back to the Basics: Digital Media Landscape

Roundtable
